## reported on slack/questions to Valerie. -- fixed in VariantAnnotation 1.27.4
## When `vcfWhich` is not null, extracting specific info() columns would not return anything. 

## an reproducible example

```{r}
library(VariantAnnotation)
fl <- system.file("extdata", "chr22.vcf.gz",
                  package="VariantAnnotation")

## without vcfWhich(), info() columns return successfully.
res0 <- readVcf(fl, genome = "hg19",
                param = ScanVcfParam(fixed = NA, info = "CIEND", geno = NA))
info(res0)
## DataFrame with 10376 rows and 1 column
##                     CIEND
##             <IntegerList>
## rs7410291           NA,NA
## rs147922003         NA,NA
## rs114143073         NA,NA
## rs141778433         NA,NA
## rs182170314         NA,NA
## ...                   ...
## rs187302552         NA,NA
## rs9628178           NA,NA
## rs5770892           NA,NA
## rs144055359         NA,NA
## rs114526001         NA,NA

## with vcfWhich(), info(CIEND, CIPOS, END, HOMLEN, HOMSEQ, SVLEN, SVTYPE) has values of NA... and returns a DataFrame of 0 column. 
rg <- rowRanges(res0)
rgsubset <- head(rg, 4)

res2 <- readVcf(fl, genome="hg19",
               param = ScanVcfParam(fixed=NA, info="CIEND", geno = NA, which = rgsubset))
info(res2)
## DataFrame with 4 rows and 0 columns

## All INFO columns. 
res1 <- readVcf(fl, genome="hg19",
               param = ScanVcfParam(fixed=NA, geno = NA, which = rgsubset))
info(res1)
## DataFrame with 4 rows and 22 columns
##                  LDAF   AVGPOST       RSQ     ERATE     THETA         CIEND
##             <numeric> <numeric> <numeric> <numeric> <numeric> <IntegerList>
## rs7410291      0.3431     0.989    0.9856     0.002     5e-04         NA,NA
## rs147922003    0.0091    0.9963    0.8398     5e-04    0.0011         NA,NA
## rs114143073    0.0098    0.9891    0.5919     7e-04     8e-04         NA,NA
## rs141778433    0.0062     0.995    0.6756     9e-04     3e-04         NA,NA
##                     CIPOS       END        HOMLEN          HOMSEQ     SVLEN
##             <IntegerList> <integer> <IntegerList> <CharacterList> <integer>
## rs7410291           NA,NA        NA            NA              NA        NA
## rs147922003         NA,NA        NA            NA              NA        NA
## rs114143073         NA,NA        NA            NA              NA        NA
## rs141778433         NA,NA        NA            NA              NA        NA
##                  SVTYPE            AC        AN          AA        AF    AMR_AF
##             <character> <IntegerList> <integer> <character> <numeric> <numeric>
## rs7410291            NA           751      2184           N      0.34       0.2
## rs147922003          NA            20      2184           c      0.01      0.01
## rs114143073          NA            20      2184           G      0.01    0.0028
## rs141778433          NA            12      2184           C      0.01      0.01
##                ASN_AF    AFR_AF    EUR_AF          VT       SNPSOURCE
##             <numeric> <numeric> <numeric> <character> <CharacterList>
## rs7410291        0.19      0.83      0.22         SNP          LOWCOV
## rs147922003        NA      0.02      0.01         SNP          LOWCOV
## rs114143073      0.02      0.01      0.01         SNP          LOWCOV
## rs141778433        NA      0.02        NA         SNP          LOWCOV

## get the row index that are having non-NA values for "CIEND" field. 
aa <- do.call(rbind, info(res0)[["CIEND"]])
idx <- which(!is.na(aa[,1]))
rgsubset <- rg[c(1:4, idx)]
res3 <- readVcf(fl, genome="hg19",
               param = ScanVcfParam(fixed = NA, info = "CIEND", geno = NA, which = rgsubset))
info(res3)
## DataFrame with 97 rows and 1 column
##                             CIEND
##                     <IntegerList>
## rs7410291                   NA,NA
## rs147922003                 NA,NA
## rs114143073                 NA,NA
## rs141778433                 NA,NA
## MERGED_DEL_2_107112        -68,85
## ...                           ...
## rs145642070                 NA,NA
## rs191291676                 NA,NA
## rs112287299                 NA,NA
## rs182839908                 NA,NA
## rs186796849                 NA,NA
```
